string-array.name: movie_descriptions
string-array.item: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.
On the way to the biggest race of his life, a hotshot rookie race car gets stranded in a rundown town and learns that winning isn\'t everything in life.
A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy\'s bedroom.

Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother. However, when society shuns him and brands him as a freak, he decides to embrace the life of crime and chaos in Gotham City.
A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency\'s training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.
